title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 584.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 584.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) These
regulations apply to any provider of services which operates or proposes to
operate a residential treatment facility for children and youth. Such
facilities are a subclass of hospitals pursuant to section 1.03 of the Mental

Hygiene Law. (b) These regulations
do not apply to hospitals operated by the Office of Mental Health, or to
hospitals issued an operating certificate by the Office of Mental Health
pursuant to Part 582 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
584.3

Amended

New

York State Register July 3, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 27, eff. 7/3/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
